definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lend on interest, or usury, be a creditor (cf. Ar. nasa0’a postpone, delay; sell on credit; ‖ form of I. [[נׇשָׁה]], v. Ges:§ 75 oo);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. [[נשֶׁא]] (anal. [[ה]] ´[[ל]]) 1Sa 22:2 every man that had a creditor; [[אֲשֶׁר נשֶׁא בוֹ]] Is 24:2 against whom is a ceditor, and pl. [[נשְׁאִים]] Ne 5:7 Kt ([[נשִׁים]] Qr, from [[נׇשָׁה]]), + acc. cogn. [[מַשָּׁא]].

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[לאׁ־יַשִּׁיא אוֹיֵב בּוֹ]] Ps 89:23 an enemy shall not act the creditor against him, make exactions of him (‖[[יְעַנֶּנּוּ]]).—1Ki 8:31, 2Ch 6:22 v. [[נשׂא]]
